document.full_text: italian prime minister silvio berlusconi has suffered a significant setback in local elections that has punctured his image of invincibility and could usher in a period of political instability.
document.title: berlusconi suffers in italian local polls
lines_and_colors: italian prime minister silvio berlusconi has suffered a significant setback in local elections that has punctured his image of invincibility and could usher in a period of political instability.
